name: MultitouchJoystick
shortDescription: Activate a joystick or buttons that can be controlled by interacting with a touchscreen.
description: Users can interact with the multitouch joystick to specify angle and force values.  These values can be used to control other objects in the scene such as movement and rotation, such as for twin-stick shooter games.
Mulitouch buttons can be used whenever a game allows the user to press multiple locations at once.
This extension is deprecated. Please install the new extension with the same name and remove this one after replacing the actions, conditions and expressions in your project.
- Add the joystick behavior to a sprite that will be the joystick
- Place the joystick object on the scene
- Run the "Activate joystick" action on every frame and specify the thumb object
- The joystick thumb object will automatically be created and moved
- Use "Simulate a touch" functions to provide mouse and gamepad controls
- More than one joystick or button can be used at the same time
- Joystick and thumb objects should have all sides the same length
- Thumb object must be smaller than the joystick object

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a button is pressed on a gamepad.
eventsFunctions.name: IsButtonPressed
eventsFunctions.sentence: Button _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ is pressed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a button is released on a gamepad.
eventsFunctions.name: IsButtonReleased
eventsFunctions.sentence: Button _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ is released

eventsFunctions.description: Change a button state for a multitouch controller.
eventsFunctions.name: SetButtonState
eventsFunctions.sentence: Mark _PARAM2_ button as _PARAM3_ for multitouch controller _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the dead zone radius of a joystick. The deadzone is an area for which movement on sticks won't be taken into account (instead, the stick will be considered as not moved).
eventsFunctions.name: SetDeadZone
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the dead zone of multitouch joystick _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ to _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: Return the dead zone radius of a joystick. The deadzone is an area for which movement on sticks won't be taken into account (instead, the stick will be considered as not moved).
eventsFunctions.name: DeadZone
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change multitouch joystick _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ dead zone to _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: the direction index (left = 1, bottom = 1, right = 2, top = 3) for an angle (in degrees).
eventsFunctions.name: AngleTo4Way

eventsFunctions.description: the direction index (left = 1, bottom-left = 1... top-left = 7) for an angle (in degrees).
eventsFunctions.name: AngleTo8Way

eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the angle of the joystick _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ to _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.sentence: Animate joystick _PARAM0_ using _PARAM2_ as the thumbstick

events.comment: Create joystick thumb and link it to the joystick
Reset values (except for angle, which stays the same)
Detect if joystick has a valid TouchID
Calculate the percent of distance the thumb has moved from the center of joystick.

events.name: Move thumb based on joystick values

events.comment: Move thumb back to center when not being pressed (acts like a spring on a real controller)
Move joystick thumb when a touch is active
If floating is enabled, move joystick to keep touch inside
Move joystick thumb to the location of the touch (but stay inside joystick)
